Package databaseConnection

Interface DBconnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsumerDBConn, DatabaseUpdate, PlatformDBConn, ShopDBConn
public interface DBconnection
This interface defines the methods required for database connection operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    database
    The name of the database.
    static final String
    password
    The password for the database connection.
    static final String
    server
    The server URL for the database connection.
    static final String
    url
    The full URL for the database connection.
    static final String
    username
    The username for the database connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    queryCupsHolding()
    Executes a query to retrieve information about cups holding.

  • Method Details

    • queryCupsHolding

      String queryCupsHolding() throws SQLException
      Executes a query to retrieve information about cups holding.
      Returns:
      a String containing the result of the query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
